lead_paragraph: Gov. Terry McAuliffe and Republican lawmakers have reached a deal that strengthens some gun control measures while reversing a policy that would have invalidated certain concealed gun permits.

headline.main: Virginia: Governor and G.O.P. Leaders Reach Compromise on Gun Laws
headline.print_headline: Virginia: Governor and Gop Leaders Reach Compromise On Gun Laws

snippet: Gov. Terry McAuliffe and Republican lawmakers have reached a deal that strengthens some gun control measures while reversing a policy that would have invalidated certain concealed gun permits.
